name: chilli
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A2 [ C or U ] the small, red or green seed case from particular types of pepper plant that is used to make some foods spicy: Add 2 chopped red chillies. I like to add a bit of green chilli. chilli sauce/oil
pidjoe/ iStock / Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
[ C or U ] (also chilli con carne) a spicy dish of meat, onions, chillies or chilli powder, and usually beans: His favourite food is chilli. I've made a chilli for tonight.
Bernard Prost/ StockFood Creative/GettyImages
[ U ] (also chilli powder) a dark red powder made from dried chillies: Add a teaspoon of chilli.
